title: SHOP OUR MEALS
cleaned_text: Click to add text... Disclaimer: Gluten & Dairy Free meals are prepared in the same facility as meals containing Dairy & Gluten ingredients. With our meal plans, we offer you a balance of macros to help you obtain your fitness goals. Whether you enjoy our "Lighter Fare," "Balanced," or "Hearty" plate portions, we have a meal plan for you! And the best part...we do all the cooking. Enjoy the convenience of delivery to your favorite gym, or have us drop it at your door - you choose, or shop our in-store offerings: [3625 East Market Street York, PA 17402](https://www.google.com/maps/dir/39.957317,-76.6990166/clean+plate+york/@39.9705639,-76.7104685,13z/data=!3m1!4b1!4m9!4m8!1m1!4e1!1m5!1m1!1s0x89c88f6c40874e53:0xd1f6f8537b437871!2m2!1d-76.650695!2d39.985102) Enjoy the freedom of eating clean without the hassle, and reclaim your time spent prepping in the kitchen! Our "Lighter Fare" plates are specially portioned with fewer carbs (30-50%), higher protein (40-50%), and just 30-40% fat. Browse our "Lighter fare" items below. Enjoy the freedom of eating clean without the hassle, and reclaim your time spent prepping in the kitchen! Our "Balanced" plates are specially portioned with a moderate amount of carbs (30-50%), lighter protein (25-35%), and less fat (25-35%). Browse our "balanced" items below. Subscribe to our Lighter Faire, Balanced, Hearty, or Mix & Match," programs; and we'll hand-select 10 Ten Meals for you weekly! Not only is it convenient; your first pack of 10 meals will arrive in your FREE Clean Plate Nutrition cooler tote! That's not the only perk you'll get, we'll also include 2 FREE meals per month with your subscription. Don't feel like subscribing anymore and want to make your own selection? No problem! You'll have an opportunity every 4 weeks to opt-out. Browse our "pick your plate" items below. Enjoy our A La Carte Menu! Check out our Family Meal Specials or choose from our curated selection of homemade proteins. Browse our "A La Carte" items below. You'll look fantastic - in Clean Plate Merch! Available in-store and online. Browse our "merchandise" items below. This is not about another diet! This is about being able to enjoy your life through eating good quality foods consistently. This is not a "Quick fix," approach to weight loss or improving your body composition. This is really about getting results you can sustain for a lifetime. No more yo-yo dieting and confused metabolism. We take great pride in helping you live a healthier lifestyle! Say "Goodbye," to watching the scale, and "Hello," to enjoying a healthy rewarding lifestyle for the rest of your life. Complete the intake below to get started on your journey! I can't wait to meet you soon. - Heidi Get discounts and latest up to date information, sign up here. There is a $70 Minimum for all online orders, excluding All of Our Meal Subscriptions and Bundles. All orders placed before 11:59 PM on Sunday will be delivered on Friday or Saturday of that week, all other orders will be fulfilled in the next week's delivery cycle. Shop our retail location M-F [3625 East Market St York PA 17402](https://www.google.com/maps/dir/39.957317,-76.6990166/clean+plate+york/@39.9705639,-76.7104685,13z/data=!3m1!4b1!4m9!4m8!1m1!4e1!1m5!1m1!1s0x89c88f6c40874e53:0xd1f6f8537b437871!2m2!1d-76.650695!2d39.985102) Clean Plate Nutrition [3625 East Market St York PA 17402](https://www.google.com/maps/dir/39.957317,-76.6990166/clean+plate+york/@39.9705639,-76.7104685,13z/data=!3m1!4b1!4m9!4m8!1m1!4e1!1m5!1m1!1s0x89c88f6c40874e53:0xd1f6f8537b437871!2m2!1d-76.650695!2d39.985102) [hello@cleanplateyork.com](mailto:hello@cleanplateyork.com) [717-318-5052](tel:7173185052) Terms [Privacy](privacy.html) Copyright ©
